item.description:
July's meeting is still being worked on. I'd like some ideas from the group. Would you like another local CFI to go over anything?

Course Osh is coming up and Red Bull is behind us. Would love a slide show of Red Bull from the attendee's and some stories.

Might still be room for any last minute additions to the FPA Airventure Hangar!

Young Eagles update from Ed Murphy will also be available with lots of pictures. Dick Maki did a wonderful job making a video of our Young Eagles for the Lancaster/Sterling Cable TV. We can show that at the meeting.

As always, Fly Often and Fly Safe.
See you all soon.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

As always, food at 6:00 and meeting at 7:00.

Where else can you have this much excitement for $25 bucks a year?

Fly Often and Fly Safe,
Charley

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association EAA Chapter 1454 Monthly Meetup
